title: The Juice Smith
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out
description: A 98% vegan cafe/restaurant/juice bar. Only exceptions are dairy milk for coffee and bee pollen. Offers hot meals, salads, raw desserts and snacks, breakfast, superfood smoothies, cold pressed juices, almond milk drinks, organic teas and fair trade coffee. Almost everything is organic and gluten free. All food is vegan and soy-free; all desserts and snacks are raw and sugar-free. Almond milk, soy milk, coconut milk are available.
